name: AndRule
desc:
Validation rule to combine rules with AND logical operation.
When all rules returns no errors, than this rule also returns no errors.
When one of the rules return errors, than the rules returns all errors.

name: AndRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values.

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: ArraySchema
desc: Schema to validate arrays.

name: ArraySchema
desc: Creates a new instance of validation schema and sets its values.

name: getValueType
desc:
Gets the type of array elements.
Null means that elements may have any type.

name: performValidation
desc: Validates a given value against the schema and configured validation rules.

name: setValueType
desc:
Sets the type of array elements.
Null means that elements may have any type.

name: AtLeastOneExistsRule
desc: Validation rule that check that at least one of the object properties is not null.

name: AtLeastOneExistsRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: DataPage
desc:
Data transfer object that is used to pass results of paginated queries.
It contains items of retrieved page and optional total number of items.

name: DataPage
desc: Creates a new instance of data page and assigns its values.

name: data
desc: The items of the retrieved page.

name: DataPage.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance of data page and assigns its values.

name: toJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: total
desc: The total amount of items in a request.

name: ExcludedRule
desc: Validation rule to check that value is excluded from the list of constants.

name: ExcludedRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values.

name: validate
desc:
Validates the given value. None of the values set in this ExcludedRule object must exist
in the value that is given for validation to pass.

name: FilterParams
desc: Data transfer object used to pass filter parameters as simple key-value pairs.

name: FilterParams
desc: Creates a new instance and initalizes it with elements from the specified map.

name: FilterParams.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance and initalizes it with elements from the specified map.

name: fromString
desc: Parses semicolon-separated key-value pairs and returns them as a FilterParams.

name: fromTuples
desc: Creates a new FilterParams from a list of key-value pairs called tuples.

name: fromValue
desc: Converts specified value into FilterParams.

name: FilterParamsSchema
desc: Schema to validate FilterParams.

name: FilterParamsSchema
desc: Creates a new instance of validation schema.

name: IChangeable
desc: Interface for data objects that contain their latest change time.

name: change_time
desc: The UTC time at which the object was last changed (created or updated).

name: IIdentifiable
desc: Generic interface for data objects that can be uniquely identified by an id.

name: id
desc: The unique object identifier of type K.

name: INamed
desc: Interface for data objects that have human-readable names.

name: name
desc: The object's humand-readable name.

name: IStringIdentifiable
desc: Interface for data objects that can be uniquely identifed by a string id.

name: ITrackable
desc: Interface for data objects that can track their changes, including logical deletion.

name: change_time
desc: The UTC time at which the object was last changed (created, updated, or deleted).

name: create_time
desc: The UTC time at which the object was created.

name: deleted
desc: The logical deletion flag. True when object is deleted and null or false otherwise

name: IValidationRule
desc: Interface for validation rules.

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: IVersioned
desc: Interface for data objects that can be versioned.

name: version
desc: The object's version.

name: IdGenerator
desc:
Helper class to generate unique object IDs.
It supports two types of IDs: long and short.

name: nextLong
desc:
Generates a globally unique 32-digit object ID.
The value is a string representation of a GUID value.

name: nextShort
desc: Generates a random 9-digit random ID (code).

name: IncludedRule
desc: Validation rule to check that value is included into the list of constants.

name: IncludedRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values.

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: MapSchema
desc: Schema to validate maps.

name: MapSchema
desc: Creates a new instance of validation schema and sets its values.

name: getKeyType
desc:
Gets the type of map keys.
Null means that keys may have any type.

name: getValueType
desc:
Gets the type of map values.
Null means that values may have any type.

name: performValidation
desc: Validates a given value against the schema and configured validation rules.

name: setKeyType
desc:
Sets the type of map keys.
Null means that keys may have any type.

name: setValueType
desc:
Sets the type of map values.
Null means that values may have any type.

name: MultiString
desc:
An object that contains string translations for multiple languages.
Language keys use two-varter codes like: 'en', 'sp', 'de', 'ru', 'fr', 'pr'.
When translation for specified language does not exists it defaults to English ('en').
When English does not exists it falls back to the first defined language.

name: MultiString
desc: Creates a new MultiString object and initializes it with values.

name: append
desc: Appends a map with language-translation pairs.

name: clear
desc: Clears all translations from this MultiString object.

name: MultiString.fromJson
desc: Creates a new MultiString object and initializes it from json values.

name: fromJson
desc: Initialize this object from JSON Map object

name: fromTuples
desc: Creates a new MultiString object from language-translation pairs (tuples).

name: fromTuplesArray
desc: Creates a new MultiString object from language-translation pairs (tuples) specified as array.

name: fromValue
desc: Creates a new MultiString object from a value that contains language-translation pairs.

name: get
desc:
Gets a string translation by specified language.
When language is not found it defaults to English ('en').
When English is not found it takes the first value.

name: getLanguages
desc: Gets all languages stored in this MultiString object,

name: innerValue
desc: Returned inner values in Map object

name: length
desc: Returns the number of translations stored in this MultiString object.

name: put
desc: Puts a new translation for the specified language.

name: remove
desc: Removes translation for the specified language.

name: toJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: NotRule
desc:
Validation rule negate another rule.
When embedded rule returns no errors, than this rule return an error.
When embedded rule return errors, than the rule returns no errors.

name: NotRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: ObjectComparator
desc: Helper class to perform comparison operations over arbitrary values.

name: areEqual
desc:
Checks if two values are equal.
The operation can be performed over values of any type.

name: areNotEqual
desc:
Checks if two values are NOT equal
The operation can be performed over values of any type.

name: compare
desc:
Perform comparison operation over two arguments.
The operation can be performed over values of any type.

name: isGreater
desc:
Checks if first value is greater than the second one.
The operation can be performed over numbers or strings.

name: isLess
desc:
Checks if first value is less than the second one.
The operation can be performed over numbers or strings.

name: match
desc: Checks if string matches a regular expression

name: ObjectSchema
desc: Schema to validate user defined objects.

name: ObjectSchema
desc: Creates a new validation schema and sets its values.

name: allowUndefined
desc: Sets flag to allow undefined properties

name: getProperties
desc: Gets validation schemas for object properties.

name: isUndefinedAllowed
desc: Gets flag to allow undefined properties

name: performValidation
desc: Validates a given value against the schema and configured validation rules.

name: setProperties
desc: Sets validation schemas for object properties.

name: withOptionalProperty
desc: Adds a validation schema for an optional object property.

name: withProperty
desc: Adds a validation schema for an object property.

name: withRequiredProperty
desc: Adds a validation schema for a required object property.

name: OnlyOneExistsRule
desc: Validation rule that check that at exactly one of the object properties is not null.

name: OnlyOneExistsRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: OrRule
desc:
Validation rule to combine rules with OR logical operation.
When one of rules returns no errors, than this rule also returns no errors.
When all rules return errors, than the rule returns all errors.

name: OrRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values.

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: PagingParams
desc: Data transfer object to pass paging parameters for queries.

name: PagingParams
desc: Creates a new instance and sets its values.

name: PagingParams.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance from json.

name: fromJson
desc: Initialize this object from JSON Map object

name: fromMap
desc: Creates a new PagingParams and sets it parameters from the specified map

name: fromTuples
desc: Creates a new PagingParams from a list of key-value pairs called tuples.

name: fromValue
desc: Converts specified value into PagingParams.

name: getSkip
desc: Gets the number of items to skip.

name: getTake
desc: Gets the number of items to return in a page.

name: skip
desc: The number of items to skip.

name: take
desc: The number of items to return.

name: toJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: total
desc: The flag to return the total number of items.

name: PagingParamsSchema
desc: Schema to validate PagingParams.

name: PagingParamsSchema
desc: Creates a new instance of validation schema.

name: ProjectionParams
desc: Defines projection parameters with list if fields to include into query results.

name: ProjectionParams
desc: Creates a new instance of the projection parameters and assigns its value.

name: operator []
desc: The object at the given index in the list.

name: operator []=
desc: Sets the value at the given index in the list to value.

name: ProjectionParams.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance from json.

name: fromJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: fromString
desc: Parses comma-separated list of projection fields.

name: fromValue
desc: Converts specified value into ProjectionParams.

name: length
desc: The number of objects in this list.

name: toJson
desc: Initialize this object from JSON Map object

name: toString
desc:
Gets a string representation of the object.
The result is a comma-separated list of projection fields
'field1,field2.field21,field2.field22.field221'

name: ProjectionParamsSchema
desc: Schema to validate ProjectionParams

name: ProjectionParamsSchema
desc: Creates a new instance of validation schema.

name: PropertiesComparisonRule
desc: Validation rule that compares two object properties.

name: PropertiesComparisonRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its arguments.

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.

name: PropertySchema
desc: Schema to validate object properties

name: PropertySchema
desc: Creates a new validation schema and sets its values.

name: getName
desc: Gets the property name.

name: getType
desc: Gets the property type.

name: performValidation
desc: Validates a given value against the schema and configured validation rules.

name: setName
desc: Sets the property name.

name: setType
desc:
Sets a new property type.
The type can be defined as type, type name or TypeCode

name: RandomArray
desc: Random generator for array objects.

name: pick
desc: Picks a random element from specified array.

name: RandomBoolean
desc: Random generator for boolean values.

name: chance
desc:
Calculates 'chance' out of 'max chances'.
Example: 1 chance out of 3 chances (or 33.3%)

name: nextBoolean
desc: Generates a random boolean value.

name: RandomDateTime
desc: Random generator for Date time values.

name: nextDate
desc:
Generates a random Date in the range 'min', 'max'.
This method generate dates without time (or time set to 00:00:00)

name: nextDateTime
desc:
Generates a random Date and time in the range 'min', 'max'.
This method generate dates without time (or time set to 00:00:00)

name: updateDateTime
desc: Updates (drifts) a Date value within specified range defined

name: RandomDouble
desc: Random generator for double values.

name: nextDouble
desc: Generates a random double value in the range 'minYear', 'maxYear'.

name: updateDouble
desc: Updates (drifts) a double value within specified range defined

name: RandomFloat
desc: Random generator for float values.

name: nextFloat
desc: Generates a float in the range 'min', 'max'. If 'max' is omitted, then the range will be set to 0, 'min'.

name: updateFloat
desc: Updates (drifts) a float value within specified range defined

name: RandomInteger
desc: Random generator for integer values.

name: nextInteger
desc: Generates a integer in the range 'min', 'max'. If 'max' is omitted, then the range will be set to 0, 'min'.

name: sequence
desc: Generates a random sequence of integers starting from 0 like: 0,1,2,3...??

name: updateInteger
desc: Updates (drifts) a integer value within specified range defined

name: RandomString
desc: Random generator for string values.

name: distort
desc: Distorts a string by randomly replacing characters in it.

name: nextAlphaChar
desc:
Generates random alpha characted A-Za-z
Returns a random characted.

name: nextString
desc:
Generates a random string, consisting of upper and lower case letters (of the English alphabet),
digits (0-9), and symbols ('_,.:-/.[].{},#-!,$=%.+^.&*-() ').

name: pick
desc: Picks a random string from an array of string.

name: pickChar
desc: Picks a random character from a string.

name: RandomText
desc: Random generator for various text values like names, addresses or phone numbers.

name: adjective
desc:
Generates a random adjective.
The result value is capitalized.
Returns a random adjective.

name: color
desc:
Generates a random color name.
The result value is capitalized.
Returns a random color name.

name: email
desc:
Generates a random email address.
Returns a random email address.

name: fullName
desc:
Generates a random person's name which has the following structure
   
Returns a random name.

name: noun
desc:
Generates a random noun.
The result value is capitalized.
Returns a random noun.

name: phone
desc:
Generates a random phone number.
The phone number has the format: (XXX) XXX-YYYY
Returns a random phone number.

name: phrase
desc:
Generates a random phrase which consists of few words separated by spaces.
The first word is capitalized, others are not.

name: text
desc: Generates a random text, consisting of first names, last names, colors, stuffs, adjectives, verbs, and punctuation marks.

name: verb
desc:
Generates a random verb.
The result value is capitalized.
Returns a random verb.

name: word
desc:
Generates a random word from available first names, last names, colors, stuffs, adjectives, or verbs.
Returns a random word.

name: words
desc: Generates a random text that consists of random number of random words separated by spaces.

name: Schema
desc: Basic schema that validates values against a set of validation rules.

name: Schema
desc: Creates a new instance of validation schema and sets its values.

name: getRules
desc: Gets validation rules to check values against.

name: isRequired
desc:
Gets a flag that always requires non-null values.
For null values it raises a validation error.

name: makeOptional
desc:
Makes validated values optional.
Validation for null values will be skipped.

name: makeRequired
desc:
Makes validated values always required (non-null).
For null values the schema will raise errors.

name: performTypeValidation
desc:
Validates a given value to match specified type.
The type can be defined as a Schema, type, a type name or TypeCode
When type is a Schema, it executes validation recursively against that Schema.

name: performValidation
desc: Validates a given value against the schema and configured validation rules.

name: setRequired
desc: Sets a flag that always requires non-null values.

name: setRules
desc: Sets validation rules to check values against.

name: validate
desc: Validates the given value and results validation results.

name: validateAndReturnException
desc: Validates the given value and returns a ValidationException if errors were found.

name: validateAndThrowException
desc: Validates the given value and throws a ValidationException if errors were found.

name: withRule
desc: Adds validation rule to this schema.

name: SortField
desc: Defines a field name and order used to sort query results.

name: SortField
desc: Creates a new instance and assigns its values.

name: ascending
desc: The flag to define sorting order. True to sort ascending, false to sort descending

name: SortField.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance from json.

name: fromJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: name
desc: The field name to sort by

name: toJson
desc: Initialize this object from JSON Map object

name: SortParams
desc: Defines a field name and order used to sort query results.

name: SortParams
desc: Creates a new instance and initializes it with specified sort fields.

name: operator []
desc: The object at the given index in the list.

name: operator []=
desc: Sets the value at the given index in the list to value.

name: add
desc:
Adds value to the end of this list,
extending the length by one.

name: SortParams.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance from json.

name: fromJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: length
desc: The number of objects in this list.

name: toJson
desc: Initialize this object from JSON Map object

name: TagsProcessor
desc:
Helper class to extract and process search tags from objects.
The search tags can be kept individually or embedded as hash tags inside text
like 'This text has #hash_tag that can be used for search.'

name: compressTag
desc:
Compress a tag by removing special symbols like spaces, '_' and '#'
and converting the tag to lower case.
When tags are compressed they can be matched in search queries.

name: compressTagList
desc: Compresses a comma-separated list of tags.

name: compressTags
desc: Compresses a list of tags.

name: equalTags
desc: Compares two tags using their compressed form.

name: extractHashTags
desc: Extracts hash tags from a text.

name: extractHashTagsFromValue
desc: Extracts hash tags from selected fields in an object.

name: normalizeTag
desc:
Normalizes a tag by replacing special symbols like '_' and '#' with spaces.
When tags are normalized then can be presented to user in similar shape and form.

name: normalizeTagList
desc: Normalizes a comma-separated list of tags.

name: normalizeTags
desc: Normalizes a list of tags.

name: TokenizedDataPage
desc:
Data transfer object that is used to pass results of paginated queries.
It contains items of retrieved page and optional total number of items.

name: TokenizedDataPage
desc: Creates a new instance of data page and assigns its values.

name: data
desc: The items of the retrieved page.

name: TokenizedDataPage.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance of data page and assigns its values.

name: toJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: token
desc: The starting point for the next search.

name: total
desc: The total amount of items in a request.

name: TokenizedPagingParams
desc:
Data transfer object to pass tokenized paging parameters for queries.
It can be used for complex paging scenarios, like paging across multiple databases
where the previous state is encoded in a token. The token is usually retrieved from
the previous response. The initial request shall go with token == null

name: TokenizedPagingParams
desc: Creates a new instance and sets its values.

name: TokenizedPagingParams.fromJson
desc: Creates a new instance from json.

name: fromJson
desc: Initialize this object from JSON Map object

name: fromMap
desc: Creates a new TokenizedPagingParams and sets it parameters from the specified map

name: fromTuples
desc: Creates a new TokenizedPagingParams from a list of key-value pairs called tuples.

name: fromValue
desc: Converts specified value into TokenizedPagingParams.

name: getTake
desc: Gets the number of items to return in a page.

name: take
desc: The number of items to return.

name: toJson
desc: Returned JSON Map object from values of this object

name: token
desc: The start token.

name: total
desc: The flag to return the total number of items.

name: ValidationException
desc: Errors in schema validation.

name: ValidationException
desc: Creates a new instance of validation exception and assigns its values.

name: composeMessage
desc: Composes human readable error message based on validation results.

name: fromResults
desc:
Creates a new ValidationException based on errors in validation results.
If validation results have no errors, than null is returned.

name: throwExceptionIfNeeded
desc:
Throws ValidationException based on errors in validation results.
If validation results have no errors, than no exception is thrown.

name: ValidationResult
desc: Result generated by schema validation

name: ValidationResult
desc: Creates a new instance of validation ressult and sets its values.

name: getActual
desc: Gets the actual value found by schema validation.

name: getCode
desc: Gets the error code.

name: getExpected
desc: Gets the value expected by schema validation.

name: getMessage
desc: Gets the human readable message.

name: getPath
desc: Gets dot notation path of the validated element.

name: getType
desc: Gets the type of the validation result: Information, Warning, or Error.

name: ValidationResultType
desc: Types of validation results generated by validation schemas.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: ValueComparisonRule
desc: Validation rule that compares value to a constant.

name: ValueComparisonRule
desc: Creates a new validation rule and sets its values.

name: validate
desc: Validates a given value against this rule.
